message:
Simplify and avoid possible NPE warning

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/fileupload/trunk@1453128 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

DiskFileItem.toString() could throw an NPE.
PR: FILEUPLOAD-134
Submitted-by: Thomas Vandahl, tv@apache.org


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/jakarta/commons/proper/fileupload/trunk@545004 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

file.patch:
@@ -96,17 +96,21 @@
       <name>Aaron Freeman</name>
       <email>aaron@sendthisfile.com</email>
     </contributor>
+    <contributor>

     </contributor>
   </contributors>

@@ -60,6 +60,10 @@ The <action> type attribute can be add,update,fix,remove.
         A MalformedStreamException is now thrown, if the size of an items
         headers exceeds HEADER_PART_SIZE_MAX;
       </action>
+      <action dev="jochen" type="fix" issue="FILEUPLOAD-134"
+          due-to="Thomas Vandahl" due-to-email="tv@apache.org">
+        DiskFileItem.toString() could throw an NPE.
+      </action>
     </release>
 
 	<release version="1.2" date="2007-02-13">

message:
A descriptive NPE is now thrown, if the FileItemFactory hasn't been set.
PR: FILEUPLOAD-123

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/jakarta/commons/proper/fileupload/trunk@494610 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

file.patch:
@@ -88,6 +88,11 @@ The <action> type attribute can be add,update,fix,remove.
         Added the FileCleanerCleanup as an example for how to close
         down the FileCleaner's reaper thread nicely.
       </action>
+
+      <action dev="jochen" type="fix" issue="FILEUPLOAD-123">
+        A descriptive NPE is now thrown, if the FileItemFactory
+        has not been set.
+      </action>
 	</release>
 
     <release version="1.1.1" date="2006-06-08" description="Bugfix release">
